name: Man & Monster
description:
A short game made in under 48h for the Miziziziz-GameJam. The game has elements from strategy, card and auto-battler games making it an interesting mix of genres.

There is a 50/50 chance to battle against humans or orcs. Try to beat both.

You might want to decrease your sound, in case the music is to loud with your settings.

Controls:

Mouse - Click on the unit you want to place and the tile you can place it on.

Known Issues:

There is currently a bug where the game is stuck when certain units battle each other. Sadly I could not reproduce it to fix the bug in time.
